Literature.Title: Computational Design of Pore-Forming Peptides with Potent Antimicrobial and Anticancer Activities
Literature.Author: Deb R, Torres MDT, Boudný M, Koběrská M, Cappiello F, Popper M, Dvořáková Bendová K, Drabinová M, Hanáčková A, Jeannot K, Petřík M, Mangoni ML, Balíková Novotná G, Mráz M, de la Fuente-Nunez C, Vácha R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>50 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=8 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli TOP 10(MIC=0.2µM),Staphylococcus carnosus CCM 4838T(MIC=0.2µM),Enterococcus faecalis JH-2-2(MIC=>32µM),Enterococcus faecalis UCN41(MIC=>32µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MIC=>60µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=15µM),Enterococcus faecium BM4147(MIC=4µM),Enterococcus faecium Z906(MIC=16µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=>60µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>8µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 1(MIC=>16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=>60),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=4µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E1120(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 4371(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae E1267(MIC=>32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=0.8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii CIP 7010(MIC=0.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii GSAB 164(MIC=1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii Z13(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=0.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCTC 13437(MIC=11µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K12(MIC=>32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli E1098(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=1.6µM),Escherichia coli AIC221(MIC=1.6µM),Escherichia coli AIC222(MIC=1.6µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=16µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=32µM)
